sentences.en: There were black-eyed girls in scarlet shawls
sentences.cn: 黑眼睛女孩儿裹着猩红披肩

sentences.en: Peas and beans – black-eyed peas, kidney beans, lima beans
sentences.cn: 豌豆和蚕豆—豇豆、四季豆、利马豆

sentences.en: In the Southern United States, people traditionally prepare a meal of collard greens, black-eyed peas and pork for a year of good luck.
sentences.cn: 在美国南方，人们会煮一餐由猪肉、甘蓝菜和黑豆组成的新年餐来祝家人来年好运。
